directions: Stir water, brown sugar, and grated ginger root together in a saucepan; bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook at a simmer for 20 minutes.
Remove saucepan from heat and add tea bags; steep tea to desired strength, 3 to 5 minutes. Remove and discard tea bags.
Stir lemon juice and honey into the tea; strain into a pitcher.
title: Honey-Lemon Ginger Tea
